name: Rein
description: Refreshing smooth malt backbone with fruit notes and floral aroma.

name: Taupō
description: Tropical passion fruit, red grapefruit, and zested orange.

name: Verus
description: Tropical fruit notes balanced with pear, melon, blueberry and citrus.

name: Époque
description: Aged 18 months in oak foeders, and conditioned on tart and Maraschino cherries. Notes of dark fruit, caramel, oak, and cherry, finishes tart and crisp.

name: Dōmbōc
description: Chocolate, caramel, dark fruit with a malty sweetness with full body.

name: Imara
description: Tropical fruit, juicy pineapple, white wine, and citrus zest.
hops: Idaho 7™, Simcoe®, Cascade CGX™, Nelson Sauvin™

name: Demeter Green Wax
description: Aged for 12 months in BLiS™ Cinnamon Maple Syrup Bourbon Barrels. Oven fresh pecan pie, maple-syrup-on a spoon unctuosity, with a warming cinnamon candy finish.

name: Faust
description: Slightly sour, dry and oaky. Aged in oak foeders on our house microflora and conditioned on fresh plums.
